AbstractDiagram Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Make SpaceMove objects out in the specified direction to make space in a given location. The top and left of the Rectangle specify the position in which to create space. The width and height of the Rectangle specify how much space to create. Details
PastePastes the clipboard contents at the specified location. Details
Remove Wire Loose EndsTraverses the referenced diagram and removes all wire ends that are not connected to anything. Details
Select AllSelects all objects in the diagram. Details
Shrink Wrap StructuresShrink Wraps all structures on the diagram. This method is recursive. Details
